Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=20.0, regions=[(0, 2, 0,
    1), (2, 3, 2, 3)])
image = 10.0 * np.ones((3, 3))
ci_pre_cti = ci_data.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_pattern_geometry_image_and_mask(
    ci_pattern=pattern, image=image)
assert (ci_pre_cti == np.array([[20.0, 0.0, 0.0], [20.0, 0.0, 0.0], [0.0, 
    0.0, 20.0]])).all()
